title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
plot: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

title: The Young Victoria
plot: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

title: Hellsing Ultimate
plot: The vampire Alucard, his master Sir Integra Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing, and his newly sired ward Seras Victoria, try to protect England from a war-crazed SS-Major who seeks to start an eternal war with his vampire army.

title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
plot: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

title: Death of a Ladies' Man
plot: A carousing college professor's life takes a series of unimaginable turns, and all the old stories are given a new twist, when he begins to have surreal hallucinations and learns he may not be long for this world.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
plot: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

title: The Black Hole
plot: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

title: The Blob
plot: A deadly entity from space crashes near a small town and starts to consume anyone in its path. Panic ensues, as shady government scientists try to contain the horrific creature.

title: Nights in Rodanthe
plot: A doctor, who is travelling to see his estranged son, sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.

title: Elizabethtown
plot: During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.

title: The Venture Bros.
plot: The bizarre escapades of pseudo-heroic scientist Dr. Rusty Venture, his competent, high-strung bodyguard, and his two overenthusiastic sons.

title: Tango & Cash
plot: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

title: Star Trek: Generations
plot: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

title: Redeeming Love
plot: Based upon the novel by Francine Rivers.

title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

title: Hercai
plot: Miran is seeking revenge for his parents death so he plans to marry daughter Reyyan from the family who were responsible for that. Unexpectedly he falls in love with Reyyan. Will this change the plan?

title: iCarly Revival
plot: A group of best friends creating a webcast while grappling with everyday problems and adventures.

title: Cadaver
plot: In the starving aftermath of a nuclear disaster, a family of three attends a charitable event at a hotel, which takes a dark turn when people start to disappear.

title: Everything's Gonna Be Okay
plot: After their father's untimely death, Nicholas and his two half-sisters are left to cope with not only a devastating loss, but also the realization that Nicholas is the one who will have to rise to the occasion and hold it all together.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head
plot: Animated MTV series about two teenage heavy-metal music fans who occasionally do idiotic things because they're bored. For them, everything is "cool" or "sucks."

title: Election
plot: A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.

title: Paper Towns
plot: After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.

title: Mortal Kombat 11
plot: When a time lord starts merging past with the present, versions of heroes from both Mortal Kombat timelines must unite to right past wrongs and save the world.

title: Double Indemnity
plot: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

title: Stuck in Love.
plot: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.

title: The Lion King 2: Simba's Pride
plot: Simba's daughter is the key to a resolution of a bitter feud between Simba's pride and the outcast pride led by the mate of Scar.

title: Along Came Polly
plot: A buttoned-up newlywed finds his strictly organized life descend into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

title: Carnivàle
plot: During the Great Depression, an Oklahoma farm boy and a charismatic minister learn that they are key players in a proxy war being fought between Heaven and Hell.

title: After Earth
plot: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

title: The Mission
plot: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

title: The Secret World of Arrietty
plot: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

title: Untitled: The Walking Dead Movie
plot: Follows Rick Grimes from the departure of his final season in the TV series.

title: The Frankenstein Chronicles
plot: Inspector John Marlott investigates a series of crimes in 19th Century London, which may have been committed by a scientist intent on re-animating the dead.

title: Andor
plot: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One', following the adventures of Cassian Andor during the formative years of the Rebellion.

title: The Vow
plot: A look at the experiences of the members of the NXIVM, an organization and sex cult who made headlines for being charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy.

title: Brittany Runs a Marathon
plot: A young woman decides to make positive changes in her life by training for the New York City Marathon.

title: Living with Yourself
plot: An existential comedy about a man struggling in life who undergoes a new treatment to become a better person, only to find that he's been replaced by a new and improved version of himself.

title: Nine
plot: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

title: Tales of Wells Fargo
plot: Jim Hardie helps Wells Fargo agents battle the bad guys.

title: Maximum Overdrive
plot: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

title: Catwoman
plot: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

title: The Midnight Gospel
plot: Clancy, a spacecaster with a malfunctioning multiverse simulator, leaves the comfort of his home to interview beings living in dying worlds.

title: Windtalkers
plot: Two U.S. Marines in World War II are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

title: Lords of Chaos
plot: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

title: Romeo and Juliet
plot: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

title: Breathless
plot: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

title: Beautiful Creatures
plot: Ethan Wate longs to escape his small southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena Duchannes. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town.

title: Siberia
plot: When an American diamond trader's Russian partner goes missing, he journeys to Siberia in search of him, but instead begins a love affair.

title: The Last Days of American Crime
plot: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

title: Sorcerer
plot: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.

title: Bang Gang (A Modern Love Story)
plot: In the well-to-do suburbs of a small town, a group of pretty average, well-adjusted sixteen and seventeen year olds are ordinary adolescents who take a singular path.

title: The Straight Story
plot: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

title: Safe House
plot: A married ex police couple are asked by a police officer and their close friend to turn their remote Guest House into a Safe House.

title: Ravenous
plot: In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
plot: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

title: Hierro
plot: Investigating magistrate Candela is transferred to El Hierro, the most remote of the Canary Islands. There, she discovers a suspicious community and is confronted by the death of a young local boy, murdered the day before his wedding.

title: The Wedding Date
plot: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis to hire a male escort to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

title: Bungou Stray Dogs
plot: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically ...                 See full summary  »

title: Nikita
plot: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

title: Paradise Lost
plot: A contemporary southern family saga that follows a prodigal son as he returns to his hometown and struggles to choose between his past and his future.

title: Titanic II
plot: A century after the fateful voyage of the original, modern luxury liner Titanic II sets sail. Will this ship suffer the same fate as her namesake?

title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
plot: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

title: Moonraker
plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

title: Rambo III
plot: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

title: Zapped!
plot: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.

title: Sabrina
plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

title: Get a Job
plot: After college, Will is having problems getting a good, lasting job, as are his roomies, his girlfriend and his just fired dad.

title: Rust and Bone
plot: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

title: Fallen Angels
plot: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

title: My Awkward Sexual Adventure
plot: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a conservative accountant enlists the help of an exotic dancer to guide him on a quest for sexual experience, leading him into a world of strip clubs, sensual massage parlors, cross-dressing and S & M.

title: Know Fear
plot: After the possession of his wife, Donald Capel and his family activate a dangerous ritual in a book used to identify and banish demons, a ritual forcing each member of the family to ...                 See full summary  »

title: Breathe
plot: The inspiring true love story of Robin (Andrew Garfield) and Diana Cavendish (Claire Foy), an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. Their heartwarming celebration of human possibility marks the directorial debut of Andy Serkis.

title: Bachelorette
plot: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

title: Delhi Crime
plot: Based on the Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
plot: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

title: Flatliners
plot: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment: by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.

title: Doctor Doctor
plot: A rising heart surgeon's life takes a turn he never expected and soon everything comes crashing down. He soon finds himself a former big city doctor turned small town doctor.

title: Survive the Night
plot: A disgraced doctor and his family are held hostage at their home by criminals on the run, when a robbery-gone-awry requires them to seek immediate medical attention.

title: Looking Glass
plot: A couple buy a desert motel where they find that strange, mysterious events occur.

title: U-571
plot: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

title: Joe
plot: An ex-con, who is the unlikeliest of role models, meets a 15-year-old boy and is faced with the choice of redemption or ruin.

title: Shook
plot: When Mia, a social media star, becomes the target of an online terror campaign, she has to solve a series of games to prevent people she cares about from getting murdered. But is it real. Or is it just a game at her expense.

title: The Skeleton Key
plot: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

title: Sid and Nancy
plot: The relationship between  Sid Vicious , bassist for British punk group  Sex Pistols , and his girlfriend  Nancy Spungen  is portrayed.

title: Skin
plot: A destitute young man, raised by racist skinheads and notorious among white supremacists, turns his back on hatred and violence to transform his life, with the help of a black activist and the woman he loves.

title: American Vandal
plot: A true-crime satire that explores the aftermath of a costly high school prank that left twenty-seven faculty cars vandalized with phallic images.

title: Driving Miss Daisy
plot: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

title: Explorers
plot: A boy obsessed with '50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

title: Florence Foster Jenkins
plot: The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice.

title: Breakdown
plot: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

title: Spring
plot: A young man in a personal tailspin flees from US to Italy, where he sparks up a romance with a woman harboring a dark, primordial secret.

title: The Nest
plot: A teenage girl in Glasgow agrees to carry a baby for couple Dan and Emily.

title: Ben-Hur
plot: Judah Ben-Hur, a prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

title: Bull Durham
plot: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

title: National Lampoon's European Vacation
plot: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

title: The Widow
plot: A woman's search to uncover the mysterious disappearance of her husband leads her to the Congo, where she's forced to seek the truth about what happened to the man she loved.

title: Diner
plot: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

title: Secret Obsession
plot: Recuperating from trauma, Jennifer remains in danger as she returns to a life she doesn't remember.

title: Anthropoid
plot: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

title: Wings of Desire
plot: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: A Scanner Darkly
plot: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

title: Jeepers Creepers III
plot: Sheriff Dan Tashtego and a team of creeper hunters enlist the help of officer Davis Tubbs to help stop the monster's eating spree.

title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
plot: After learning that her friends, as well as herself, are the magical Elements of Harmony, studious unicorn Twilight Sparkle is sent by her mentor, Princess Celestia, to Ponyville to study the magic of friendship with help from her friends.

title: Johnny English Strikes Again
plot: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

title: That's So Raven
plot: A teenage girl periodically receives brief psychic visions of the near future. Trying to make these visions come true results in trouble, and hilarious situations, for the girl and her friends.

title: Kubo and the Two Strings
plot: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

title: The Nines
plot: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.

title: Wolves
plot: A boy is trying to find out about his family history and stumbles upon a town of lycans.

title: Words on Bathroom Walls
plot: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

title: Dope
plot: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

title: Run Lola Run
plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: Unpregnant
plot: A 17-year old Missouri teen named Veronica discovers she has gotten pregnant, a development that threatens to end her dreams of matriculating at an Ivy League college, and the career that will follow.

title: Money Plane
plot: A professional thief with $40 million in debt and his family's life on the line must commit one final heist - rob a futuristic airborne casino filled with the world's most dangerous criminals.

title: Mogul Mowgli
plot: A British Pakistani rapper is on the cusp of his first world tour, but is struck down by an illness that threatens to derail his big break.

title: Brockmire
plot: A famed major league baseball announcer who suffers an embarrassing and very public meltdown live on the air after discovering his beloved wife's serial infidelity decides to reclaim his career and love life in a small town a decade later.

title: Nacho Libre
plot: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

title: Samson and Delilah
plot: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences they both regret.

title: The Wicker Man
plot: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

title: Mary and Max
plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

title: Verónica
plot: Madrid, 1991. A teen girl finds herself besieged by an evil supernatural force after she played Ouija with two classmates.

title: Dead Alive
plot: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

title: House on Haunted Hill
plot: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

title: If I Stay
plot: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

title: Deep Blue Sea 3
plot: Studying the effects of climate change off the coast of Mozambique, a marine biologist and her team confront three genetically enhanced bull sharks. Now, a new bloodbath is waiting to happen in the name of science. Will humans never learn?

title: The Captain
plot: In the last moments of World War II, a young German soldier fighting for survival finds a Nazi captain's uniform. Impersonating an officer, the man quickly takes on the monstrous identity of the perpetrators he's escaping from.

title: Mako Mermaids
plot: A young man is magically turned a merman, and discovers his underwater origins, after he comes in contact with the magic waters at the mysterious Mako Island guarded by a trio of mermaids.

title: True Story
plot: When disgraced New York Times reporter Michael Finkel meets accused killer Christian Longo - who has taken on Finkel's identity - his investigation morphs into a game of cat-and-mouse.

title: When We First Met
plot: Noah meets Avery at a Halloween party and falls in love but gets friend-zoned. 3 years later, she's engaged to someone else. Noah returns in a time machine to fix things.

title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
plot: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns , she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's ,"I love you."

title: Staying Alive
plot: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

title: Two of Us
plot: Pensioners Nina and Madeleine have hidden their deep and passionate love for many decades, but their bond is put to the test when they are suddenly unable to move freely between each other's apartments.

title: Our Planet
plot: Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world, from the remote Arctic wilderness and mysterious deep oceans to the vast landscapes of Africa and diverse jungles of South America.

title: Wisting
plot: Homicide detective William Wisting struggles with the two toughest cases of his career. His serial killer investigation crosses paths with his journalist daughter's news story, putting her in grave danger.

title: Pirate Radio
plot: A band of rogue DJs that captivated Britain, playing the music that defined a generation and standing up to a government that wanted classical music, and nothing else, on the airwaves.

title: Eight Legged Freaks
plot: Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

title: The Void
plot: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.

title: The Producers
plot: A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.

title: Flightplan
plot: A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet, the child vanishes, and nobody will admit she was ever on the plane.

title: Whatever Works
plot: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcée from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

title: Maps to the Stars
plot: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

title: Death in Venice
plot: While recovering in Venice, sickly Composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

title: Baby
plot: A coming-of-age story that explores the unseen lives of Roman high schoolers. Loosely inspired by a true story, the series follows a group of Parioli teenagers as they defy society in their search for identity and independence

title: The Game
plot: A spinoff of  Girlfriends  (2000) featuring a group of women who all have relationships with professional football players.

title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

title: Judging Amy
plot: A family drama focused on three generations of women living together in Hartford, Connecticut.

title: Lightyear
plot: The story of Buzz Lightyear and his adventures to infinity and beyond.

title: Temple Grandin
plot: A biopic of  Temple Grandin , an autistic woman who has become one of the top scientists in the humane livestock handling industry.

title: The Game Plan
plot: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

title: The Orphanage
plot: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

title: Now Apocalypse
plot: While on quests to pursue love, sex, and fame with his friends in Los Angeles, Ulysses' premonitory dreams make him question the possible presence of a dark and monstrous conspiracy.

title: Winter's Tale
plot: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

title: Here Comes the Boom
plot: A high-school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extracurricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

title: Taxi
plot: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

title: Waitress
plot: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

title: People of Earth
plot: Journalist Ozzie Graham is skeptical when he investigates a support group for oddballs who think they have been abducted by aliens -- yet the more he learns, the more confused, intrigued, and seduced he becomes.

title: Summer of Rockets
plot: Cold war drama following a Russian Jewish inventor and his family living in Britain.

title: I Am Your Man
plot: In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

title: My Week with Marilyn
plot: Colin Clark, an employee of Sir  Laurence Olivier , documents the tense interaction between Olivier and  Marilyn Monroe  during the production of  The Prince and the Showgirl  (1957).

title: V
plot: A year after Liberation Day, courtesy of the red-dust bacteria, the humanoid, lizard-like aliens develop a resistance to the micro-organism and try to regain control of the Earth--only now some humans are knowingly working with them.

title: Aelay
plot: A neo-realistic comedy set in a rural town, exploring the relationship between a father and a son.

title: The Simpsons Movie
plot: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

title: Mystery Road
plot: Detective Jay Swan is assigned to investigate a mysterious disappearance on an outback cattle station. Soon, Jay's investigation uncovers a past injustice that threatens the fabric of the whole community.

title: Stuart Little
plot: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
plot: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

title: 6 Days
plot: Based on the Iranian Embassy siege of 1980, this action-thriller dramatizes a six-day standoff between armed Iranian Arabs and SAS soldiers ready for a counterattack.

title: Dan in Real Life
plot: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.

title: Yes, Dear
plot: Yes, Dear is a comedy about two young couples and their outrageously contrasting views on parenting.

title: Sleepover
plot: Desperate to improve their social status, four best friends enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.

title: Die Hart
plot: Kevin Hart plays a fictionalized version of himself on a quest to land the action-movie role of a lifetime.

title: Suburra
plot: A gangster known as "Samurai" wants to turn the waterfront of Rome into a new Las Vegas. All the local mob bosses have agreed to work for this common goal. But peace is not to last long.

title: All Eyez on Me
plot: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

title: How Do You Know
plot: After being cut from the U.S.A. softball team and feeling a bit past her prime, Lisa finds herself evaluating her life and in the middle of a love triangle, as a corporate guy in crisis competes with her current, baseball-playing beau.

title: Chicago Hope
plot: The lives and trials of the staff of a major hospital in Chicago.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
plot: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

title: Salem's Lot
plot: A novelist and a young horror fan attempt to save a small New England town which has been invaded by vampires.

title: Ladybugs
plot: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

title: Streets of Fire
plot: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
plot: Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang solve more mysteries together, each time with a different living, late or fictional celebrity guest.

title: Brain on Fire
plot: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

title: Into the Storm
plot: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

title: Takers
plot: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

title: Shallow Grave
plot: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

title: Brothers by Blood
plot: A tale of family, friendships and betrayal in the violent world of the Philadelphia mob.

title: COVID-21: Lethal Virus
plot: The climate change has released an ancient rabies virus trapped in the Antarctica ice. A female scientist tries to get to the laboratory to create a cure to save the world, protected by an eccentric and two members of the special forces.

title: Million Dollar Arm
plot: A sports agent stages an unconventional recruitment strategy to get talented Indian cricket players to play Major League Baseball.

title: Mr. Bean
plot: Bumbling, childlike Mr. Bean has trouble completing the simplest of tasks in day-to-day life, but his perseverance and resourcefulness frequently allow him to find ingenious ways around problems.

title: Young Adult
plot: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

title: Starman
plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and makes her drive him across the country. The government tries to stop them.

title: Johnny English Reborn
plot: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down Chinese Premier Xiang Ping.

title: Hand of God
plot: A morally-corrupt judge suffers a breakdown and believes God is compelling him onto a path of vigilante justice.

title: Kim Possible
plot: A high school cheerleader and her accident-prone best friend balance their duties as global crime-fighters with the typical challenges of adolescence.

title: Free Willy
plot: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

title: The November Man
plot: An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.

title: Justice League Part Two
plot: The plot is unknown.

title: The Haunting
plot: A study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

title: Soap
plot: The soap-operish antics of two families: the Campbells and the Tates.

title: Mechanic: Resurrection
plot: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

title: Race to Witch Mountain
plot: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

title: Perfect
plot: A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.

title: United States of Tara
plot: A woman struggles to find a balance between her dissociative identity disorder and raising a dysfunctional family.

title: Close
plot: A female bodyguard is hired to protect an heiress on the run from assassins.

title: Agora
plot: A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hope of pursuing freedom while falling in love with his mistress, the philosophy and mathematics professor Hypatia of Alexandria.

title: Earthquake Bird
plot: An enigmatic translator with a dark past is brought in for questioning after an ex-pat friend, who came between her and her photographer boyfriend, ends up missing and presumed dead.

title: The Time Traveler's Wife
plot: A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

title: The Magic of Belle Isle
plot: Monty Wildhorn, an alcoholic novelist of Westerns, has lost his drive. His nephew pushes him to summer in quiet Belle Isle. He begrudgingly befriends a newly single mom and her 3 girls who help him find the inspiration to write again.

title: Midnight Run
plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

title: The Barrier
plot: In 2045, Spain like the rest of the western world has been driven into a dictatorial regime by the lack of natural resources. Life in the countryside is impossible, and in the city a fence divides peoples into the powerful, and the rest.

title: Tears of the Sun
plot: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

title: The Ringer
plot: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

title: King Richard
plot: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

title: The International
plot: An Interpol agent attempts to expose a high-profile financial institution's role in an international arms dealing ring.

title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
plot: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open and shut case.

title: 47 Meters Down
plot: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

title: Tau
plot: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house.

title: Tales of the City
plot: A middle-aged Mary Ann returns to San Francisco and reunites with the eccentric friends she left behind. "Tales of the City" focuses primarily on the people who live in a boardinghouse turned apartment complex owned by Anna Madrigal at 28 Barbary Lane, all of whom quickly become part of what Maupin coined a "logical family". It's no longer a secret that Mrs. Madrigal is transgender. Instead, she ...                 See full summary  »

title: Jobs
plot: The story of  Steve Jobs ' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
plot: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

title: Beloved
plot: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman

title: Johnny Mnemonic
plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

title: I Am Wrath
plot: Stanley Hill opens a can of brutal vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops who are protecting them.

title: Laverne & Shirley
plot: The misadventures of two single women in the 1950s and '60s.

title: We Summon the Darkness
plot: Three best friends embark on a road trip to a heavy-metal show, where they bond with three aspiring musicians and head off to one of the girls' country home for an after-party.

title: The Rescuers
plot: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

title: Sisters
plot: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

title: Where Has Poor Mickey Gone?
plot: Things go terribly wrong for four youths, ejected from a London nightclub for rowdiness, after they decide to break into a Magic shop, where they tie up and terrorize the owner. They find ...                 See full summary  »

title: Broadcast News
plot: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

title: Beginners
plot: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

title: Home Alone 3
plot: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

title: Villains
plot: After a pair of amateur criminals break into a suburban home, they stumble upon a dark secret that two sadistic homeowners will do anything to keep from getting out.

title: MADtv
plot: A sketch comedy show based on the seminal Mad Magazine.

title: Grudge Match
plot: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout, thirty years after their last match.
A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

title: Like Mike
plot: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.

title: Home
plot: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

title: All That
plot: A zany sketch comedy featuring many wacky characters hosted for kids and by kids.

title: The Legend of Zorro
plot: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

title: A Perfect Murder
plot: A wealthy Wall Street speculator discovers that his wife has a lover. He investigates him and uses the carrot and stick to make him murder his wife. Planned to detail, it seems like a perfect murder.

title: Rent-a-Girlfriend
plot: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a college student enlists a dating service to "rent" a girlfriend who, unbeknownst to him, happens to be both a fellow student and his neighbor.

title: The Strangers: Prey at Night
plot: A family of four staying at a secluded mobile home park for the night are stalked and then hunted by three masked psychopaths.

title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
plot: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

title: Sheena
plot: Sheena grew up in the African wild, raised by a mystical witch woman. When her foster mother is framed for a murder Sheena is forced to flee, helped by her ability to talk to animals and her knowledge of the jungle.

title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
plot: Alexander's day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

title: 4 Blocks
plot: Based in Neukölln, Berlin Toni manages the daily business of dealing with the Arabic gangs and ends up wanting to leave his old life behind for his family, but as expected, it's never that simple.

title: Blow the Man Down
plot: Mary Beth and Priscilla Connolly attempt to cover up a gruesome run-in with a dangerous man. To conceal their crime, the sisters must go deep into the criminal underbelly of their hometown, uncovering the town's darkest secrets.

title: The Voice
plot: Four famous musicians search for the best voices in America and will mentor these singers to become artists. America will decide which singer will be worthy of the grand prize.

title: Bringing Out the Dead
plot: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

title: The Salisbury Poisonings
plot: Fact based drama about the Novichok poisoning crisis in Salisbury in 2018.

title: Mr Selfridge
plot: Centers on the real-life story of the flamboyant and visionary American founder of Selfridge's, London's department store.

title: The Paramedic
plot: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.
